sent2: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
Some of the cookies were chocolate.
Three of the players were skillful.
The weekend was sunny and windy.
He thought the movie was good but not excellent.
sent1: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
She liked but didn't love the shirt.
Some but not all of the cookies were chocolate.
Two of the players were skillful.
The weekend was either sunny or windy.
He thought the movie was good.
